website_summaries.verdict: A 6-slice capacity model with knobs instead of a digital interface.
pros: Comes with a roasting pan and rack that can be positioned at 2 different heights
cons: No option to bake without convection

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Our old toaster oven finally died. This model has convection oven amoung the settings. I like the 3 dials - one for temp, one for time and one for convection or regular toaster oven cooking. I've used the convection oven setting and it is pretty quiet and completely cooks like a regular oven and at a much faster speed. This one is jujst a bit deeper than the old one so you can put a small pizza in it or a pie! I'm happy with the unit all around - no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G. Waddell

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, works well in all respects .
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this purchase. I'll first say that this is Not a large unit, interior room is small. There is only 1 usable shelf. Very easy to use with no digital electronic controls- all hand rotated knobs. Heats well and quickly, I haven't had any bad experiences with this. Would I buy again? No - because - size is very small and it would be nice to be able to use more than one shelf at a time. One suggestion: The arrow marker on the dials is Not easily visible, so I used a permanent red marker to highlight it and it looks surprisingly good and works. I suggest they do better to indicate the arrow position.
customer_reviews.author: Shaunagain

customer_reviews.title: A really good machine. Simple as that.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice machine. It'll fit a small pizza or two or three large slices. Good toaster, but takes a bit to warm up. Convection bake works nicely, especially for a tray of french fries! The only improvement I would make is to the knobs. They're smooth. If you have the slightest bit of butter or oil on your fingers, you'll go nuts trying to turn these things! Maybe the next iteration of this machine will have textured or ribbed knobs. You won't be sorry if you get it.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: It will burn your house down!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! I never write reviews; however, I would be remiss if I did not warn people about this product. It is the worst toaster oven on the market. The temperature settings for toasting do not work properly. So, you can set it for light toast, and it will barely heat up. Turn the gauge a bit more and it will completely burn your toast and possibly more! The picture here is after one piece of toast on medium setting. I really wanted this product to work since it is attractive, and Oyster generally has good quality products. However, after several near miss burning issues, it is going straight in the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, little safety problem
customer_reviews.text: Pretty styling and cooks very well. Took off a star because I burned my hand opening the door because I didn't realize the door itself was burning hot and didn't take care to keep my hand away from it. Also, if depth matters, remember to include the depth of the electrical plug in your calculations. Mine added to the depth and the cabinet the item is in won't shut...
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V.

customer_reviews.title: Makes great cornbread! Makes really good roasts too
customer_reviews.text: I've had no problems at all with this oven. Makes great cornbread! Makes really good roasts too! On the convection setting I have to cook mine about 50 degrees less than the normal temp.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H.

customer_reviews.title: What a disappoitment, compared to the 4 slice Oster conveted oven.
customer_reviews.text: I had my older model for about 4 years, and it wan't warming up as fast, or toasting as well. I was delighted to find the 6-slice Oster Oven to replace it. It is not at all the same. It does not turn off automatically after toasting or baking. It does not heat up as well as my old toaster oven. Worst of all, the oven handle is not insulated. You need an oven mitt to open and close the door, unless you enjoy burning your hand. Guess I will keep my older Oster until it no longer works at all.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in July 2019. Cooked a bagel on Nov 11, 2019. Oven door exploded shortly after (pic attached). Luckily I was not injured.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Litz

customer_reviews.title: On the fence with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a defective metal rack. Called Oster and they told me they do not have a metal rack replacement on hand and instructed me to order one online for $5. Granted, it’s only $5, but I expected them to replace the part since it arrived in that condition. The broken piece wasn’t even in the box, so it was originally packaged defective. Also, trying to get the timer just right so toast doesn’t burn is a chore. But, I do like the convection option. I just wish I would’ve kept my Panasonic. I had no issues with it, just wanted the convection cooking option.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but runs hotter than temp control numbers
customer_reviews.text: We researched toaster ovens a lot before choosing this one to replace an old Oster. We liked the enamel-coated steel pan (some come with flimsy aluminum pans with no rack) and oven size. But first bake job was way overcooked before the time was up! So we checked temp control with an oven thermometer. Result: 100 degree difference!! Had to use black marker to mark temps on oven control to adjust temps.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good toaster oven. I like that it is eco-friendly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Burns before it bakes.
customer_reviews.text: Food burns long before it’s cooked inside. Wanted this for appetizers, pizza or cookies. You can’t turn off the fan. Really disappointed. Wish I could return. UPDATE: I actually threw this away. Too dangerous to give to a friend or Goodwill. Be very careful when using this and NEVER walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design - dangerous and cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: Good luck trying to get consistent toasting from this unit. The knob that is used to set the toast time is very poorly designed. The dial turns 3/4 of the way to set the timer up to an hour leaving. Trying to get a consistent toast time is a joke, if you are off by a millimeter your toast is burnt to a crisp. The knob sticks near the end and the toaster will stay on instead of the bell ringing. Dangerous and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: ascendr

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR $!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute GARBAGE!Drip pan is too small but most of all Bakes unevenly and much hotter than temp should be..Baked a single cake and edges were burned by the time the center was cooked..
customer_reviews.author: E8 00B-50 Retired

customer_reviews.title: Mine arrived with flaws. Low quality metal exterior.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with flaws. The 4 feet were uneven lengths making the oven sit tilted and a fire danger. There was no way to put the crumb catching tray under the heating element which would have made cleaning it a hassle. Low quality metal exterior which would probably scratch up really fast with just everyday use. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: rabbit rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this toaster oven. I've had an Oster toaster oven for years and this was a replacement. It seems very cheaply made. First the electric cord is much too short. I have to strain to get the cord to the el outlet. Secondly, the third dial for time is very stiff going back to set the time. I have Rheumatoid Disease which makes it difficult to move this dial. Lastly, the unit stays hot much too long, hot to the touch. Be careful if you have small children
customer_reviews.author: Alice R.

customer_reviews.title: Oven runs HOT!!
customer_reviews.text: I realize convection ovens run hotter than conventional ovens, but the one I received ran 75° more than set temperature. I returned for a refund. Do not not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Really fits the bill!
customer_reviews.text: For a smaller convection oven, this thing really fits the bill for a two person household. Not having to crank up on our regular sized electric stove/oven to heat two servings of tater-tots or french fries, cook a small meat loaf, bake a couple of potatoes, or what ever, it really saves both time and energy using the confection option. Cooking times are a bit shorter as apposed our conventional oven, so have to watch and adjust actual cooking times, but haven't had a burnt meal yet. Using foil on the included drip tray and roasting pan saves messy clean-up too.
customer_reviews.author: Sassykat

customer_reviews.title: and broils just fine and the item itself is pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It toasts, bakes, and broils just fine and the item itself is pretty sturdy. The reason I only gave it 3 stars is because it doesn't have an off switch or button. The timing dial is not precise to the half minute, like my old Oster was, so in order to stop it I have to pull the plug out of the wall. That's effective, but not the mechanism I would prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Being jewish, I need to clean for passover once a year and this year I had to say goodbye to my conventional oven...which was the SAME MODEL AS THIS ONE!! That's right, Im ordering it again because it was THAT GOOD! The old one worked really well, i had to get rid of it because there was some food stuck to it that i could not sell on passover. 5/5 stars, I highly recommend this model!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dblmo7

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should...but
customer_reviews.text: This was my daughters birthday gift, so this is what she had to say about item. "PROS: It is 'clean', sleek & modern looking. It does everything it is supposed to do. CONS: The instructions are confusing. Using the toaster is not a simple task. You have to have the manual handy for even the simple functions." It was smaller than she thought it would be, even though she measured it. After seeing hers & her using it for a week or two, this is not the oven that I will be buying for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: If I use the regular bake mode- the thermostat kicks on and off alot- so I use the warming setting where the bottom element runs
customer_reviews.text: Its just what we needed to bake biscuits without heating up the kitchen. It does get hot on the outside- but on a smaller scale. If I use the regular bake mode- the thermostat kicks on and off alot- so I use the warming setting where the bottom element runs only- and does a good job. I set the temperature a little lower than called for in receipes and the food browns about right. The preheat is quick. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: home handy man

customer_reviews.title: Temp not accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas gift, we didn't exchange gifts until last weekend, almost 4 weeks after Christmas. The oven temp is way off, it burned everything we tried to cook. Put an oven thermometer in it- oven set to 325 tactual temp was 460. I will be returning this if it's not too late
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This toaster oven is no good for baking anything
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven is no good for baking anything. It burns the outside within 5 minutes and the inside will still be frozen and uncooked. Very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Oster TSSTTVRB04 Convection Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven is exactly as advertised. It performs extremely well on all settings: broil, warm, toast, pizza and convection bake. Having the temperature settings and timer make this little oven very convenient to use. The toaster oven has a fairly small footprint so sits nicely on the counter and is nice looking with its brushed stainless steel cabinet. I would recommend this particular toaster oven to anyone seeking a good looking well functioning small multipurpose oven.
customer_reviews.author: Chileman

customer_reviews.title: Right size
customer_reviews.text: This is convenient and love the size. Doesn't broil well though. Had food in for 15 minutes, highest temperature, highest rack and still didn't broil. Haven't tried the bake or other features.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Toast Function Dial no longer working correctly
customer_reviews.text: I have had Oster before and was pleased. But within 6 months of purchase, the dial and function for toast option, no longer works correctly. I tried contacting the company and get nowhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sister Sharon Dillon

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE VERY SCARY
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews expressing this product will burn your house down countless times I have set this product to toast and within 3 minutes it is smoking excessively. I have used Oyster products in the past and after years of use from our old Oyster toaster it finally broke. I invested in this new model and deeply regret my purchase. Very scary how quickly it will burn food and strongly advise others to look into other option for a toaster or at the very least other models. Very varied reviews with this product sounds like I may have unfortunately received one of the defective models.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can put a whole pizza in it!
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced, looks good, works well, cleans easily and has a timer. You can put a whole pizza in it, too, and that makes it a great toaster oven!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Black

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice toaster oven overall, but maybe a little smaller than I would prefer. My only real complaint is that the wire rack does not lock in so you have to be careful when taking hot food out because the rack may come out with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I love this convection oven! This is my second. The first one lasted for 8 years with 4 teenagers abusing it daily! The only reason why I replaced it was the timer stopped working and I was over cooking everything. It’s as durable as they come, cooks fast, and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything looked great....
customer_reviews.text: Never turned it on, never plugged it in. The cord is too short; about 6" short than that of the oven I am replacing. It's a big oven so I was a little surprised about how short the cord is.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worthless for making toast
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace an existing model. This one has a timer that is impossible to use accurately. I have burnt toast more in the last 3 months than the last 30 years. It is very difficult to turn the timer knob and almost impossible to set it where you want. It often seems to stay on indefinitely -though I suspect it is just that the knob ends up way past where intended. The dial is very small, which does not help with setting accurate time
customer_reviews.author: Peter S

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommend this Convection Toaster Oven! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this toaster oven!! Since I bought it I have made toast and bagels in it and I have used it to cook up chicken nuggets and fries for my kids and baked sweet potatoes for our dinner. It is an awesome addition to have especially when I have the oven at a certain degree and need to make another dish at another degree. The interior of it is a bit smaller than I had expected, but I can still toast a lot of things at one time, so that totally works for me. I definitely recommend this unit for anyone looking for a convection toaster oven, can't beat it for it's price either.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, works great.
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these and the timer burned out in 3 weeks. But Amazon sent me a new one and I haven't had any problem with this one. The controls could be a little easier to see. I have to bend over to see it. Also, if your hands are wet, the knobs are slick, not having any traction on them. Other than that, we like it well. It takes 6 slices of toast. So far I haven't used it for a casserole or pizza, but I usually use the larger oven for those things.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: So so...
customer_reviews.text: Hard to read the knobs because the knob sticks out over the readings. Works well enough with no problems. Really cheesy wire rack and broil plate. Would not buy again. Too many other better broilers out there for the same money.
customer_reviews.author: YeeHa!

customer_reviews.title: Like a second complete oven.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great upgrade to my older and small toaster oven. The convention bake turns this toaster and broiler into a great kitchen alternative without the expense of a wall oven. The features are all useful. I like everything about this product. And the stainless makes a great look. Highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: This toaster works fine, but it’s so cheaply made that only 1 month in, the hinge on the door to open it is broken. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: V. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in Dec.2014 and though the knob indicators are difficult to see we decided to live with that inconvenience....so folks with limited vision, take heed....Now the broiler element does not work, making it impossible to toast or broil foods! I can't return it so we will live with it's limited capabilities till we get disgusted and go to a store and buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Nanoo

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: After spending a month reading reviews on Amazon about toaster ovens, I came to the conclusion that the Oster would best suit my needs in terms of size, ease of function and safety. I made the right choice. The oven is a convection oven. Period. It toasts and broils without problem. Time to move on to bigger life decisions.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Love this oven!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this convection oven!!! We had an old 4 slice toaster oven that i used constantly but i needed an upgrade. I am so happy that i choose this oven. Ive been using it for months now and i have to problems and it cooks everything perfectly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: pmorris

customer_reviews.title: Oster Toaser Oven
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. After seeing it in my friend's house, I was disappointed that it seemed to be cheaply made. My friend like this item, but I was not impressed with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: What a great toaster oven!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I have lived this long without this toaster oven! I have not used my actual oven since receiving this one. It works great! I actually cooked a full size Red Barron frozen pizza in it last night - from frozen to golden brown and bubbly in 18 minutes. AMAZING. This is a great product and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Sobel

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. The timer did not work on the oven and therefore burned everything. It was returned with a full refund including postage.
customer_reviews.author: YL

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The toast is evenly baked
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The toast is evenly baked. The size is what I was concerned about. and this one was perfect for where I wanted to put it on the counter. In time I'm sure I'll use more of the features. I did burn a pizza but it was my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Open your carton ASAP!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product came without ANY racks or pans. Obviously, can’t use without at least the main rack. I am trying to get Oster customer service to send me the toast rack, the broil pan & rack. I am feel like this is a never ending battle. Don’t think I will ever get to use this. This was a Christmas gift so it wasn’t opened right away. Huge Huge mistake!!
customer_reviews.author: KFF

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a year. Used one day per week.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to heat up ham biscuits. Used one day per week. Lasted one year and is now smelling like there is an electrical problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Better than  I expected.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite object I’ve ever gotten from Amazon. Exceeded my expectations. I debated purchasing this for some years. I’m so glad I finally gave in. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great replacement for an older toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace our older toaster oven. I resisted, although the old one always burned the tops of bagels, etc! This one is just the right size for our smaller counter, with the added features I didn't know I wanted, but that I use all the time. No more burned bagels or toast. It broils veggies to perfection, without having to turn on my big oven. I'm super happy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nachos!
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job toasting reheating, and light baking. Timer knob can be a bit tough to grip and turn. No internal light, and as others have stated, the convection fan is a bit noisy. But it does the job, and isn't an eyesore.
customer_reviews.author: Dax

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT toaster and convection oven
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT toaster and convection oven! I prefer using this over my oven to make fries/tater tots. One drawback - when making multiple batches of toast, the second and subsequent batches brown more quickly than the first batch, so you need to use less time. You could also say that the toast timer doesn't work consistently when making multiple batches. Still, it does an excellent job, especially as a convection oven, so I'd but this unit again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Stein

customer_reviews.title: Small,fast cooking
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this small convection oven especially the fact that I do not have to heat the whole kitchen by turning on the conventional oven. I love the size of it because it does not take up a lot of counter space.
customer_reviews.author: judy canady

customer_reviews.title: Great oven!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new toaster oven and this is way better than my previous oven. Easy to use and clean. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: H. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after less than a year
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this less than a year ago and it no longer works. It started giving us trouble about a month ago (wouldn’t always turn on when you then the dial) and now it’s completely “toast.”
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Hobe

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Looks beautiful on the counter. I like to bake in parchment paper to keep the toaster oven clean. Everything browns nicely. This is my first convection oven. It works great and cooks evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: the oven is a nice looking appliance. easy to use, controls easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M Gabrish

customer_reviews.title: Does everything without having to use your oven for simple cooks even small baking!
customer_reviews.text: I love the oster convection ovens fits nicely on small counter and cooks just about everything. I had a younger model and like that they made pans non stick like am real oven pan and the metal shelf must have a different coating bc is scrubs much better!!
customer_reviews.author: jessica Lee Pavon

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, reliable, excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toaster oven. Quick, easy to clean, My favorite! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KKMA

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the unit I bought for my home years before, this one is cheaply made. Food burns easily and it puts off A LOT of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful ,space efficient
customer_reviews.text: At $60.00 this is a great value. holds 6 slices of bread, love the removable crumb collector, stainless exterior and large handles are very attractive and look expensive!
customer_reviews.author: dede

customer_reviews.title: Not over-engineered - a nice change from other "modern" electronics
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Designed the old fashion way: simple. I especially like the timer feature.. I'm a sucker for the classics - no key pad to punch into, just a knob to turn (& based on muscle memory, I just kind of know how far to turn it depending on the dish).
customer_reviews.author: Stella Wang

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Love using it. Things cook in a third of the time. Very easy to clean. Wish cord was longer. Got burned trying to reach behind to pull out cord.
customer_reviews.author: deb lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great for toasting
customer_reviews.text: Use it for reheating left overs and toasting bread and waffles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Toaster oven died after barely 2 years of use. Oven began to automatically shut off and stop heating the food with several minutes still remaining on the timer. Forced to throw it in the garbage bin and buy a replacement. No more Oster products after this!
customer_reviews.author: J. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Love! Cooks quickly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace toaster and rid ourselves of microwave. Love! Cooks quickly. Can easily fit 9" cake pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: This is great when you don't want to use your big oven. I use this more than my big oven.
customer_reviews.author: nora j cromer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Not complicated and doesn't take up very much counter space. Perfect for toast, baking potatoes, etc. Stainless steel all around so it's very easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: ChristyK

customer_reviews.title: NEEDS A SIMPLE FIX
customer_reviews.text: This counter top oven has met all of my expectations, except one. For safety sake, the rack should have stoppers on each side to prevent it from accidentally being pulled too far out, and dropping the hot contents. This is a safty hazard that a simple design fix would avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Nonny

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven!!
customer_reviews.text: I am admittedly a "toaster oven person". But that being said, this toaster oven is the best one I've ever had the privilege of owning!!! It very evenly bakes/ cooks. And warming up is very speedy! It is large enough to bake cookies, casseroles, roast chicken...I hardly use my range anymore. It's great for toasting, too!! Unlike some reviews, I find the knobs very easy to see and use. Thank you Oster for making my life more easy and fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product.using every day. Very high quality products. My wife love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Yousuf

customer_reviews.title: TIMER BREAKS AFTER LIGHT USE. CANNOT BE REPLACED OR FIXED.
customer_reviews.text: TIMER BROKE IN LESS THAN YEAR WITH LIGHT USE. IT HAS TO BE PLUGGED IN TO USE AND UNPLUGGED WHEN FINISHED USE. IT SUCKS. NOW I HAVE TO BUY ANOTHER OVEN. OTHERWISE WAS GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Pan

customer_reviews.title: Fix the bugs
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great for convection oven but not so good for toaster
customer_reviews.author: Teri Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday oven. Fast!
customer_reviews.text: Convection perfection, love how fast it heats up. Great for pizza but does a roast tenderloin better than my full size convection oven.
customer_reviews.author: Suellen I Silva

customer_reviews.title: It is Oster the best name for all your needs.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Convection oven easy to install and used works great a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: R.West

customer_reviews.title: Keep making these great appliances!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. This was a replacement for the identical one that I have been using for at least ten years which finally gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Werner V. Hobart

customer_reviews.title: good little oven, a small problem
customer_reviews.text: Larger interior means I can warm plates at last! Functions seem to work well, only possible negative is that the settings knobs are hard to read and even somewhat mysterious. I expect it to live up to it's long-life reputation!
customer_reviews.author: GloryBe

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: It’s beautiful however it’s very noisy when bake is selected. Besides being noisy it works great. I luv it. I would’ve given it 5 stars but for the noise it makes.
customer_reviews.author: shelleann grant

customer_reviews.title: It should have been cut with ridges so there would be a better grip. I created my own traction grip by ...
customer_reviews.text: My one negative comment is about the Timer Knob - it's difficult to turn because the surface of the knob is very slippery and the knob is stiffer to turn. It should have been cut with ridges so there would be a better grip. I created my own traction grip by wrapping a rubber band around the knob. I believe in "necessity is the mother of invention." Oster should consider this when they next engineer a product. (the other knobs are engineered differently. The temperature knob spins easily and the Function knob clicks a notch at a time)
customer_reviews.author: DJJNYC

customer_reviews.title: Oster Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made! I live in a small house and it allows me to cook and bake without firing up the big oven! Bakes evenly and quickly. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lelia Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the office and everyone loves it. Instead of going out for lunch every day, instead they make lunch. Great buy.

customer_reviews.title: Love The Quickness
customer_reviews.text: Why did I have a regular toaster oven before?! I have been wasting so much time. This little dandy is great! Have had it a while now and I haven't had one problem with it. It heats up quick, Cooks food quickly and browns just fine.

customer_reviews.text: Huge. Can fit a pizza inside of it. Works flawlessly.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I looked a long time before settling on this convection toaster oven. We've used it about a year now. I'm satisfied with the design and features. I wish it would have come with more pans that fit this size oven. I would buy it again

customer_reviews.title: Like It A Lot
customer_reviews.text: I have used this oven several times and it has worked great. I have used the broiler and the pizza settings and the food has turned out well. As with all toaster ovens caution should be used as hey do get hot.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, works well, does what it says it will do. Good purchase.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: This is a good toaster oven. My only complaint would be that it does not have side handles...I move it from the wall to cook & then move it back. Since it is so hot I have to wait until it cools off to move it back.
customer_reviews.author: LynnB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toster Oven .
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Toster..All Silver. I can Read all the knobs without my glasses. Great Size....I no longer use my regular oven.....I Bake...Broil....Grill everything in this.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product over 6 months ago and use it almost daily. It cooks great and the size is such that I find almost everything can be cooked satisfactorily without turning on my conventional oven.

customer_reviews.title: burns easily. Overall nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Very hot toast setting, burns easily. Overall nice quality, good looking and doesn't obnoxiously beep like so many others.

customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but works perfect and nice it takes up such little counter space!

customer_reviews.title: Great little oven.
customer_reviews.text: Myself and wife live in a tiny house and this is just like a real oven works great easy to keep clean perfect for or little home.

customer_reviews.title: Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: We gave this toaster oven to our son and daughter in law. They are very happy and said the first few times they used it, it cooked so quickly they burned their hot dogs.

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Works great and fits perfectly on the counter under the cabinets. Great looking and cooks everything just right. I highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quickly
customer_reviews.text: This oven cooks insanely fast. We finally figured out how to cook things well. It does fit a whole frozen pizza and keeps things like crust or tater tots crispy!

customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing, works perfect! they tray is a little smaller than I'd like (probably a good reason for that) but all in all its grrrrrrreat!

customer_reviews.text: Toasting six slices of bread it’s tight but it works -it is easy to use- and yes it’s easy to clean.

product_meta.title: Oster Convection Toaster Oven, 6 Slice, Brushed Stainless Steel (TSSTTVRB04)
product_meta.description: Cook with the convenience of an oven on your countertop using the Oster 6-Slice Convection Toaster Oven. Featuring a sleek brushed stainless steel housing, this toaster oven uses convection technology to distribute heat evenly for thorough cooking and excellent results. The oven's generously sized interior offers enough space to accommodate a large frozen pizza, while its adjustable rack can be placed in two positions, so you can customize the space whether you’re cooking a tall roast or baking chocolate chip cookies. An energy-efficient alternative to turning on the full-size oven, this countertop toaster offers three user-friendly control dials for selecting the cooking function, adjusting the temperature to up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, and setting the 60-minute timer. The timer can also be turned to the stay-on position for continuous cooking. The Oster 6-Slice Convection Toaster Oven also features a transparent door for checking the status of your food at a glance, a wide easy-grip door handle, an easy-to-clean interior, and an internal removable crumb tray for convenient cleaning. It comes with a durable baking pan.
feature_bullets: 6-slice toaster oven with convection technology for faster, more even cooking
Wide temperature range of 150 to 450 degrees F lets you cook with convenience of an oven
Versatile toast, bake, and adjustable broil functions; 60-minute timer with auto shut-off
2 rack positions to accommodate a wide variety of foods from tall roasts to pizza.Watts: 1300W
Includes removable crumb tray and durable baking pan
NOTE: Refer user manual before use
